layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x327

      LayoutBlockFlow {p} at (0,0) size 784x20

          text run at (0,0) width 161: "THEAD VALIGN=TOP"

                text run at (382,2) width 61: "the image"
